text: jo log us cheez mein krpanata se kaam lete hai, jo allaah ne apanee udaar krpa se unhen pradaan kee hai, ve yah na samajhe ki yah unake hit mein achchha hai, balki yah unake lie bura hai. jis cheez mein unhonne krpanata se kaam liya hoga, vahee aage kiyaamat ke din unake gale ka tauq ban jaega. aur ye aakaash aur dharatee ant mein allaah hee ke lie rah jaenge. tum jo kuchh bhee karate ho, allaah usakee khabar rakhata hai
